Member Function Documentation

Vector getBottomRightMargin (   ) 
 

Returns the bottom and right margin sizes in pixels.

This specification always overrides the outer margin specifications of outer fields.

Returns:
The bottom and right margin sizes in pixels.

int getColumns (   ) 
 

Returns the number of columns for fields within this container (fields area or group field).

The cells are built from this column specification, and the spans of each field. If a row's span sum exceeds the columns specification, the next row starts.

Returns:
The number of columns for fields within this container or 0, if this container has only one row which collects all fields.

Component* getContainer (   ) 
 

Returns the fields area or group field this layout data belongs to.

Returns:
The fields area or group field this layout data belongs to.

Vector getTopLeftMargin (   ) 
 

Returns the top and left margin sizes in pixels.

This specification always overrides the outer margin specifications of outer fields.

Returns:
The top and left margin sizes in pixels.

void layoutIfAutomatic (   )  [protected]
 

Relayouts the fields area, if automatic layouting is enabled.

void setBottomRightMargin (  Vector  bottomRightMargin  ) 
 

Sets the bottom and right margin sizes in pixels.

This specification always overrides the outer margin specifications of outer fields.

Parameters:
bottomRightMargin The bottom and right margin sizes in pixels.
Note:
Calling this method relayouts the fields area, if automatic layouting is enabled, so consider turning off the automatic layout when doing major changes.

void setColumns (  int  columns  ) 
 

Sets the number of columns for fields within this container (fields area or group field).

The cells are built from this column specification, and the spans of each field. If a row's span sum exceeds the columns specification, the next row starts.

Parameters:
columns The number of columns for fields within this container or 0, if this container has only one row which collects all fields.
Note:
Calling this method relayouts the fields area, if automatic layouting is enabled, so consider turning off the automatic layout when doing major changes.

void setTopLeftMargin (  Vector  topLeftMargin  ) 
 

Sets the top and left margin sizes in pixels.

This specification always overrides the outer margin specifications of outer fields.

Parameters:
topLeftMargin The top and left margin sizes in pixels.
Note:
Calling this method relayouts the fields area, if automatic layouting is enabled, so consider turning off the automatic layout when doing major changes.

Vector bottomRightMargin [private]
 

The bottom and right margin sizes in pixels.

This specification always overrides the outer margin specifications of outer fields.

Definition at line 64 of file ContainerLayoutData.h.

int columns [private]
 

The number of columns for fields within this container (fields area or group field).

The cells are built from this column specification, and the spans of each field. If a row's span sum exceeds the columns specification, the next row starts. If this field is 0, this container has only one row which collects all fields.

The fields area or group field this layout data belongs to.
